item.title: Convert Reader into BufferedReader in Java using Apache Commons IO
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to use the IOUtils utility class in Apache Commons IO to convert a Reader object into a BufferedReader object in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons IO library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons IO library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'commons-io:commons-io:2.
